doc:
Dark_fantasy http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dark_fantasy 0 Dark fantasy is a subgenre of fantasy literary, artistic, and cinematic works that incorporate darker and frightening themes of fantasy. It also often combines fantasy with elements of horror or has a gloomy, dark tone, or a sense of horror and dread. Dark fantasy is a subgenre of fantasy literary, artistic, and cinematic works that incorporate darker and frightening themes of fantasy. It also often combines fantasy with elements of horror or has a gloomy, dark tone, or a sense of horror and dread.
